TEXT.TITLE: DATA MED CLINICAL SUPPORT<DMCS.O> 1ST QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Period ended May 31 Shr loss five cts vs loss 11 cts Net loss 306,007 vs loss 102,420 Sales 110,522 vs 10,105 NOTE: Full name is Data Med Clinical Support Services Inc Per-share data adjusted for three-for-one stock split payable June 30, 1987 The only sales reflected in fiscal 1987 period are sales recorded subsequent to the May 22, 1986 acquisition of the assets of a predecessor company by Data Med Reuter
